attributes.action: Lower the age from which uk residents can drive to lower premeums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If drivers could drive as a provisional from the age of 16 and then allowed to take their test at 17 or 18, then they would have a lot more control over a car. While learning to drive for the year or maybe two would then lower their insurance premiums in no claims discount and allow them more time to develop their vital road skills.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
